short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Put the ads back in the Social Network

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Put the ads back in the Social Network with Ello Ads.
Install the extension, and whenever you're on ello.co the ads will appear.
More info here: http://ello-ads.co/
